title: open source static or dynamic malware unpacker
content: I am looking for static and dynamic unpacker tools. I only found PE-Explorer the only can handle UPX packer. So I am carious to know is there any open source static or dynamic unpacker?

answers_data.content: There's quite a few dynamic ones which can handle simple wrapping packers. One example is PackerAttacker .

comments.text: Thanks for your reply. It is kind of simple, I am looking for more strong tool like Justin or renovo or omniUnpack

@user2942756 I'm the lead dev on The PackerAttacker, and I've got to tell you that it's much better than omniUnpack. I haven't tried the others, but we have a huge success rate with The PackerAttacker in daily use.
@NickCano wow.really? I need to try that.. Thanks
Note that you still need a Microsoft Detours license if you want to use this tool in a professional setting.
Thanks everyone. My last question is that can I use this tool on Linux too?
